doc.name: Combine
doc.description: Combine actor for combining synchronous signals (ports with a token or no token) using a combine function.
doc.author: Christian Motika
doc.port: This is a multiport for input (known) signals.
Output a signal here iff any connected input signal is known. This is a constant value of "1" indicating the presence, always.
Output a resulting value. This is a constant value of "1", always.
doc.property: The function to compute a combine operation on signals. This is a string-valued attribute that defaults to "add".
